## Quality Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are checked before requesting review -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines (`make format`)
- [ ] No linting errors (`make lint`)
- [ ] Type hints included for new code
- [ ] Type checking passes (`make type-check`)
- [ ] Docstrings added for public functions/classes
- [ ] Code is self-documenting with clear variable/function names

### Testing & Coverage
- [ ] Tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Tests updated for modified functionality
- [ ] All tests pass (`make test`)
- [ ] Coverage remains ≥90%
- [ ] Edge cases covered

### Documentation
- [ ] README.md updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated with entry in Unreleased section
- [ ] Docstrings added/updated
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Type hints are clear and accurate

### Review
- [ ] Self-reviewed code
- [ ] No debug code or console logs left
- [ ] No commented-out code
- [ ] All CI checks pass
- [ ] Commits have clear, descriptive messages
- [ ] Branch is up-to-date with base branch

- [ ] Performance improved
